mdRecord.dcterms:title: Riches of the Mines, detail view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Barnett, Thomas P. (American architect, 1870-1929) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This lunette is one of eight along the west end mezzanine that illustrate Missouri's development and resources. The view here is of a zinc mine with large piles of chat all around the mine property. On the left is the mine building with smoke pouring from tall smokestacks. In the middle is a stagnant stream or pool. On the right is a "cave-in" with a dumping pier beyond. -- http://collections.si.edu/ [work]
